Metadata.homeTitle: Teklifo. Managing RFQs and quotations efficiently
Metadata.homeDescription: Unified B2B platform for interaction between companies. Request and send quotations, publish product and service catalogs, price lists, and information on current stock levels.
Metadata.loginDescription: Log in to your Teklifo account
Metadata.checkEmailDescription: Follow the link in the email to complete your log in
Metadata.myCompaniesDescription: List of companies you are a member of
Metadata.newRoleDescription: Create a new role within the company
Metadata.newCompanyDescription: Create a new company on Teklifo
Metadata.myRFQDescription: List of your quotation requests to suppliers
Metadata.newRFQTitle: New request for quotation to suppliers
Metadata.newRFQDescription: Create a request for the products you are interested in and send it to suppliers
Metadata.updateRFQDescription: Update an existing RFQ to suppliers
Metadata.myQuotationsDescription: List of my quotes to clients
Metadata.newQuotationDescription: Send a quotation to the client based on the received RFQ
Metadata.supplierGuideDescription: Confirm participation in the private RFQ
Metadata.updateQuotationDescription: Update an existing quotation for the client

API.pageAndlimitAreRequired: You must specify the page and limit parameters
API.userIsNotAMember: The user is not a member of the company
API.noEmail: Without specifying the user's email address, accepting the invitation is not possible
API.memberDeleted: The user has been excluded from the company.
API.cantDeleteLastAdmin: {userName} is the only remaining administrator of {companyName} and cannot be removed from the company
API.roleIsBeingUsed: The role is currently in use by company members and cannot be deleted
API.companyDeleted: Company {companyName} and all associated data have been successfully deleted
API.defaultRoleCantBeChanged: The predefined role cannot be changed or deleted.
API.dependingCompanies: {username} is the only administrator left in {companyName}. Please change permissions in the user's companies first or delete these companies
API.idIsNotUnique: The identifier {id} is already assigned to another company
API.nameIsNotUnique: The name {name} is already assigned to another company
API.tinIsNotUnique: TIN {tin} is already assigned to another company

API.requesterCantParticipate: You cannot participate in your own RFQ

MyCompanies.title: My companies
MyCompanies.subtitle: List of companies you are a member of

CompanyForm.title: New company
CompanyForm.name: Company name
CompanyForm.idDescription: This is a unique identifier for your company in Teklifo. It may only contain lowercase Latin letters and the '-' symbol
CompanyForm.createSubtitle: Register a new company through which you will conduct your trading activities
CompanyForm.newCompanyIsCreated: Hooray! Your new company has been successfully created
CompanyForm.newCompanyHint: Now you can proceed to configure additional company settings
CompanyForm.companyIsUpdated: The company has been successfully updated
CompanyForm.companyIsUpdatedHint: Users will now see updated information about the company

Company.companyDeleteTitle: Are you sure you want to delete company {name} (TIN: {tin})?
Company.companyDeleteSubtitle: Once deleted, it will no longer be possible to restore the company. Continue?
Company.companyDeletedHint: Also removed related information on the company
Company.noDescription: The company did not provide a description about itself.

Stock.title: Warehouses
Stock.subtitle: List of warehouses of the company
Stock.newStockHint: Now you can upload new products to the new warehouse.
Stock.name: Warehouse name
Stock.stockDeleteTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this warehouse?
Stock.stockDeleteSubtitle: This action will no longer be possible to undo, and all data associated with this warehouse will also be deleted.
Stock.stockDeletedHint: All data related to this warehouse has also been deleted.
Stock.noStocks: Your company does not have any warehouses yet.
Stock.noStocksHint: Create a new company warehouse right now

PriceType.newPriceTypeHint: Now you can download product prices

PriceType.newPriceTypeSubtitle: Create a new type of prices for the company's products

PriceType.priceTypeDeleteSubtitle: It will no longer be possible to undo this action, and all data associated with this type of price will also be deleted.
PriceType.priceTypeDeletedHint: All data related to this type of price has also been removed.
PriceType.priceTypeIsUpdated: The price view has been changed.
PriceType.noPriceTypes: Your company does not yet have any types of product prices.
PriceType.noPriceTypesHint: Create a new type of product prices right now

Member.title: Participants
Member.subtitle: List of members of the company
Member.invitationIsSentHint: The user will become a member of the company immediately after confirmation.
Member.newMemberSubtitle: Enter the email address to which the invitation letter will be sent, and also specify the role you plan to grant to the new member.
Member.memberDeleteTitle: Are you sure you want to remove this member from the company?
Member.memberDeleteSubtitle: This action can no longer be undone, and all data associated with this user will be deleted.
Member.memberDeleted: The user has been excluded from the company.
Member.memberDeletedHint: All data associated with this user has been deleted.
Member.deleteError: Failed to remove member from company

Role.title: Roles
Role.subtitle: List of Company Roles
Role.newRoleHint: You can now assign this role to company members.
Role.name: Role name
Role.roleDeleteTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this role?
Role.roleDeleteSubtitle: It will no longer be possible to undo this action.
Role.roleDeletedHint: Information about this role has been removed.
Role.updateRoleSubtitle: Change the role name and permissions

Settings.title: User settings
Settings.subtitle: Change your user information
Settings.name: Username
Settings.userDeletedHint: User information and all related information have been removed.
Settings.userDeleteTitle: Are you sure you want to delete your user?
Settings.userDeleteSubtitle: You will be removed from all companies and all information associated with this user will also be deleted.

CompanyProducts.title: Goods
CompanyProducts.subtitle: List of company's products
CompanyProducts.noProducts: Your company does not yet have a product list.

MyRFQ.title: My requests
MyRFQ.subtitle: List of your price requests from suppliers
MyRFQ.noMyRFQ: Your company has not yet requested prices from suppliers.
MyRFQ.noMyRFQHint: Try requesting prices for the products you are interested in right now

MyQuotations.title: My suggestions
MyQuotations.subtitle: List of your commercial offers to clients
MyQuotations.noMyQuotations: Your company has not yet participated in RFQs.

RFQForm.newTitle: New request for quotations from suppliers
RFQForm.newSubtitle: Create a price request for the products you are interested in. Specify the list of products, desired prices and delivery times, as well as the terms of mutual settlements, and then send the request to suppliers
RFQForm.updateSubtitle: Update your RFQ information to suppliers
RFQForm.newRFQHint: You can now send this request to suppliers
RFQForm.rfqIsUpdatedHint: Changes to the RFQ have been published
RFQForm.title: Headline
RFQForm.titleDescription: Briefly express in the title the general content of your request
RFQForm.makePrivateHint: A private RFQ will only be visible to suppliers with whom you share a unique link.
RFQForm.productInputHint: Enter manually or select a product from the list
RFQForm.rfqConfirmSubtitle: Once confirmed, you will be able to share the request with suppliers.
RFQForm.invalidForm: Check that all form fields are filled in correctly.

ProductSelect.title: Product selection
ProductSelect.queryHint: Please enter the product name or number...

RFQ.publicHint: This price request is available for viewing by all users.
RFQ.privateHint: This request can only be seen by users who have a link to it.
RFQ.rfqDeleteTitle: Are you sure you want to delete price request #{number}?
RFQ.rfqDeleteSubtitle: Once deleted, suppliers will no longer be able to view the contents of this request or send you commercial offers based on it.
RFQ.rfqDeletedHint: Suppliers will no longer be able to view this request or send you commercial offers based on it.
RFQ.shareRfqHint: Simply copy the link below and send it to your potential suppliers in any way convenient for you.
RFQ.rfqIsCompleted: The period for collecting commercial proposals has ended
RFQ.quotationSubtitle: Send a commercial proposal to the client in response to the received request for quotation
RFQ.noQuotations: There are no offers for this request yet.
RFQ.participationTitle: Confirm participation in the request for quotation?
RFQ.participationSubtitle: Once participation is confirmed, you will be able to prepare and submit your commercial proposal.
RFQ.participationConfirmedHint: Now you can prepare and send a commercial proposal
RFQ.participationError: Unable to confirm participation in the request

SupplierGuide.title: Congratulations! You have followed the link to the closed RFQ
SupplierGuide.subtitle: In order to view this RFQ and submit your commercial offer, you only need to take 3 simple steps
SupplierGuide.subtitleAlt: To view this RFQ and submit your commercial offer, please confirm your participation
SupplierGuide.faqTitle: I am a supplier and would like to view this RFQ
SupplierGuide.stepTwo: Become a member of one of the <existing>existing companies</existing> or create a <new>new company</new>
SupplierGuide.stepThree: Confirm your company's participation in the client's RFQ
SupplierGuide.participationTitle: Confirm your participation in the price request
SupplierGuide.participationSubtitle: Once confirmed, your company will be granted access to view the price request and create a response commercial proposal.
SupplierGuide.participationConfirmed: Your company's participation in the RFQ has been confirmed
SupplierGuide.participationdHint: Your company can now review a customer's RFQ and respond with your own quote.
SupplierGuide.confirmError: Unable to confirm company's participation in RFQ

WelcomeScreen.title: Hello!
WelcomeScreen.hintText: We noticed that you are not currently a member of any company. All major activity on Teklifo is carried out through them. Please contact one of the existing companies with a request to join its members or create your own!

Quotation.title: Commercial offer to the client
Quotation.subtitle: Send a commercial proposal to the client in response to the received request for quotation
Quotation.newQuotationHint: The counterparty has been notified of your commercial offer.
Quotation.quotationIsUpdatedHint: Notification of updated commercial offer sent to counterparty
Quotation.quotationConfirmTitle: Send a commercial proposal to a client?
Quotation.quotationConfirmSubtitle: After confirmation, the client will be sent a notification about your commercial offer.
Quotation.skipHint: Skip this item if you don't want to submit your offer for it.
Quotation.quotationDeleteTitle: Are you sure you want to delete the commercial offer?
Quotation.quotationDeleteSubtitle: It will no longer be possible to restore it. The client who requested this commercial offer will also lose access to it.
Quotation.quotationDeletedHint: If necessary, you can create a new commercial offer to replace the deleted one.
Quotation.outdated: Deprecated due to changes in the price request
Quotation.invalidForm: Check that all form fields are filled in correctly.

Home.title: Create RFQs and select the best quotations
Home.subtitle: Streamline purchasing in your company
Home.stepText1: Prepare RFQ in minutes by specifying all necessary details: item name, quantity, currency, expected prices, and delivery times
Home.stepText2: Send your RFQ to suppliers using your preferred method: via email or messaging apps
Home.stepText3: Compare all received quotations based on prices, delivery times, and other parameters. Generate reports in real time
Home.featuresSubtitle: Automate routine bid collection tasks to streamline your procurement department's workflow, allowing you to focus on what truly matters
Home.featureText1: Reduce quotations analysis time by consolidating them into a single format. Avoid the hassle of messy spreadsheets and minimize the risk of human errors
Home.featureText2: By selecting the most advantageous offers, you can reduce purchasing costs and increase your company's profits
Home.featureText3: Connect a free extension for 1C:Enterprise to create RFQs and quotations directly from 1C
Home.suppliersTitle: Customers are waiting for your quotations
Home.suppliersSubitle: As a supplier, you gain access to RFQs from a diverse range of buyers. Open new sales markets, foster strong and mutually beneficial relationships with customers, and enhance trust in your company
Home.joinNowSubtitle: You can access all the main features of the service completely free: no need to link bank cards or pay any commissions. Join us and see for yourself!

QuotationsCompare.title: Compare offers
QuotationsCompare.subtitle: Analysis of commercial offers from suppliers
QuotationsCompare.position1: The best offer for this position
QuotationsCompare.position2: The second best offer for this position
QuotationsCompare.position3: Third best offer for this position
QuotationsCompare.priceLowerThanRequested: The price is {percentage}% higher than requested
QuotationsCompare.deliveredEarlier: Delivery before the requested date by {daysDifference} days.
QuotationsCompare.deliveredLater: Delivery later than requested by {daysDifference} days.
QuotationsCompare.orderByDateAsc: First the old ones, then the new ones
QuotationsCompare.orderByDateDesc: First the new ones, then the old ones
QuotationsCompare.noQuotation: The supplier was unable to provide a quote for this item.

RFQSearch.title: Search for price requests
RFQSearch.subtitle: Find potential buyers
RFQSearch.endDate: Closing date for the collection of proposals

CompanyFilter.hint: Select the companies you want to filter by
CompanyFilter.queryHint: Enter the name or TIN of the company...
CompanyFilter.selectCompanyHint: Select companies from the list on the left

Invitation.title: Wow! You received an invitation from {companyName}
Invitation.subtitle: Company {companyName} has sent you an invitation to join its members. If you do not wish to accept it, simply ignore it.
Invitation.invitationAccepted: You have confirmed your membership in {companyName}
Invitation.invitationAcceptedHint: You can now interact with data about this company.
